entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
